Detailed Description

Called by SearchProcessor to decode vanilla search request packets.

Used to create vanilla search request packets.

Vanilla search is a quick but somewhat restrictive kind of search. Use it if:

  • You want to find a street and do not care about the street number.
  • Confidence sort is not required.

Decodes a vanillasearchrequest and inits the parameters.

Parameters:
zipCode first part of the zipcode
city first part of the city name
searchString the search string
nbrHits the minimum number of requested hits
matchType the kind of string matching
stringPart the part of the strings to match
sortingType the kind of sorting requested
categoryType object type mask.
requestedLangauge The requested language.
dbMask The mask of available databases.
regionsInMatches The search region types or:ed together that should be in the reply matches.
topRegion The top region to perform the search in. Only applies when making an overviewsearch in SearchRequest.

void VanillaSearchRequestPacket::encodeRequest (  uint32  numMapID,
const uint32 *  mapID,

SearchTypes::SearchSorting  sortingType,
uint16  categoryType,
uint16  requestedLanguage,
uint32  regionsInMatches,
StringTable::countryCode  topRegion
) 
 

Encodes the vanilla serch request parameters into the packet.

Parameters:
numMapID the number of mapIDs
mapID a vector of mapIDs
zipCode first part of the requested zipcode or "" or null
city first part of the city name or "" or null
searchString the string to find matches for
nbrHits the minimum number of hits that should be returned. 0 is the normal value. If more than zero, the search restrictions will be reduced until the requested number of hits has been produced. That is, if (nbrHits > 0) the search request might be handled in a fuzzy way.
matchType the strictness of the string matching
stringPart the part of the string to match
sortingType the kind of sorting requested. Valid values for vanillasearchrequest are SEARCH_NO_SORT and SEARCH_ALPHA_SORT
categoryType a mask of object types. A combination of streets, companies, business categories, ...
requestedLangauge The requested language.
dbMask The mask of available databases.
regionsInMatches The search region types or:ed together that should be in the reply matches.
topRegion The top region to perform the search in. Only applies when making an overviewsearch in SearchRequest.
